sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ProductService } from 'src/app/services/product.service' import { Product } from 'src/app/models/product'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-list', templateUrl: './product-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-list.component.css'] }) export class ProductListComponent implements OnInit { productList: Product[] = [] constructor(private productService: ProductService) { } ngOnInit() { this.productList = this.productService.getProducts() } }
